item.title: 印尼计划通过110亿美元股票发售满足流通股目标
item.description: 印尼正准备进行约110亿美元的股票发售，以满足更严格的流通股规定，此举旨在避免被明晟公司（MSCI Inc.）降级为前沿市场。【原文：Indonesia is bracing for share sales of around $11 billion to meet tougher free-float rules aimed at heading off a potential downgrade to frontier market status by MSCI Inc.】

item.title: 全球资金涌入印度国有银行，信贷增长势头强劲
item.description: 追踪国有银行的指数今年迄今已上涨12%。【原文：An index tracking state-owned lenders is up 12% so far this year.】

item.title: 铁矿石或创2022年以来最长连跌纪录，因供应端显现积极信号
item.description: 铁矿石正朝着2022年以来最长的周跌幅纪录迈进，因市场出现松动迹象：澳大利亚供应量增加，中国港口库存居高不下。【原文：Iron ore was on track for the longest streak of weekly losses since 2022, weighed by signs of a loosening market as flows improved from Australia and Chinese ports saw elevated stockpiles.】

item.title: 诺华以1.59亿美元出售持股退出印度上市公司
item.description: 诺华集团已同意出售其在印度上市子公司的多数股权，标志着两年前宣布的战略审查计划最终完成。【原文：Novartis AG has agreed to sell a majority stake in its listed Indian unit, marking the culmination of a strategic review announced two years ago.】

item.title: 中国AI初创企业假期后迎来爆发式增长，大型科技公司轮番涌入
item.description: 中国生成式人工智能初创企业智普科技和MiniMax集团的股票在香港市场农历新年后重启交易时大幅上涨，投资者纷纷涌入纯粹的人工智能概念股，同时撤出传统互联网巨头。【原文：Shares of China’s generative AI startups Zhipu and MiniMax Group Inc. soared in Hong Kong as the market reopened after the Lunar New Year, with investors piling into pure AI plays and rotating out of traditional Internet giants.】

item.title: 巴西最高法院允许警方深化对Banco Master的调查
item.description: 巴西最高法院法官安德烈·门东萨扩大了联邦警察对Banco Master SA银行欺诈案的调查权限，这意味着当局得以深化此次令该国政治和金融体系动荡的调查。【原文：Brazil Supreme Court Justice Andre Mendonca broadened Federal Police access to a fraud investigation into Banco Master SA, effectively allowing authorities to deepen the probe that has rattled the country’s political and financial systems.】

item.title: 美元有望创10月以来最佳单周表现，美联储降息预期减弱
item.description: 美元正准备创下四个月来最佳周表现，因交易员下调对美联储降息的预期，同时地缘政治风险提升了该货币的避险吸引力。【原文：The dollar is poised to notch its best week in four months as traders pare back expectations for Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts while geopolitical risks boost the currency’s haven appeal.】

item.title: 纽蒙特与巴里克就内华达合资项目发生争执，通知已发出
item.description: 纽蒙特公司向巴里克黄金公司发出所谓违约通知书，此前该公司发现其在内华达州合资企业存在管理不当的证据，导致双方在重要采矿区域的合作关系紧张升级。【原文：Newmont Corp. sent Barrick Mining Corp. a so-called notice of default after finding evidence of alleged mismanagement at a Nevada joint venture, escalating tensions between the partners in a key mining region.】

item.title: 押注马斯克SpaceX股价，韩国券商股暴涨200%
item.description: 未来资产证券公司股价今年已飙升逾三倍，成为投资者押注埃隆·马斯克旗下SpaceX公司的替代投资标的，该公司即将进行可能引发轰动的首次公开募股。【原文：Mirae Asset Securities Co. shares have more than tripled this year as a proxy bet on Elon Musk’s SpaceX ahead of its potential blockbuster initial public offering.】

item.title: 前谷歌工程师被控窃取手机处理器技术
item.description: 两名前谷歌工程师及其丈夫之一被起诉，指控其涉嫌窃取与该公司Pixel手机Tensor处理器相关的商业机密。【原文：Two former Google engineers and one of their husbands were indicted for allegedly stealing trade secrets relating to the company’s Tensor processor for Pixel phones.】

item.title: 玩具制造商Funko吸引精明投资者Pleasant Lake入股
item.description: 对冲基金Pleasant Lake Partners披露其为玩具制造商Funko Inc.的投资者，并正敦促该公司启动正式出售流程，该基金表示可参与其中。【原文：Hedge fund Pleasant Lake Partners disclosed it’s an investor in toymaker Funko Inc., and is pushing the company to launch a formal sale process that it said it could participate in.】

item.title: 新西兰储备银行行长布雷曼认为经济复苏不会引发通胀
item.description: 新西兰储备银行行长安娜·布雷曼表示，今年该国经济有空间实现复苏，同时不会引发过度通胀。【原文：New Zealand’s economy has room to recover this year without generating excessive inflation, Reserve Bank Governor Anna Breman said.】

item.title: 住友制药股价下跌，因干细胞疗法获支持
item.description: 住友制药公司股价下跌，此前日本政府专家小组批准了该公司基于诺贝尔奖得主开创性技术研发的再生疗法，但该疗法仍需满足特定条件。【原文：Sumitomo Pharma Co. shares declined after a Japanese government panel endorsed a conditional approval for its regenerative therapy, built on technology pioneered by a Nobel Prize laureate.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长拉加德再次呼吁合作以维护全球秩序
item.description: 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜·拉加德再次呼吁建立全球伙伴关系，以挽救一个不仅惠及最强者的国际秩序。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde reiterated calls for global partnership to salvage an international order that not only benefits the strongest.】

item.title: 日本经济产业大臣高市早苗将大力宣传旨在刺激私人消费的计划
item.description: 日本首相高市早苗将在新议会会期开幕之际，提出一项宏大的经济愿景。该政策旨在通过政府引导，激发私营部门对关键产业的投资，以确保国家未来发展。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi is set to mark the opening of a new parliamentary session by presenting a broad economic vision in which government policies help stoke private investment into key industries to secure the nation’s future.】

item.title: 日本CPI降温至两年最低增速，因数据失真
item.description: 日本核心通胀指标放缓至两年最低水平，给央行带来沟通挑战——该行很可能在时机成熟时仍将坚定上调基准利率。数据公布后日元汇率走弱。【原文：Japan’s key inflation gauge eased to the slowest pace in two years, posing a communication challenge for a central bank that will likely stay determined to raise the benchmark interest rate when the timing is right. The yen weakened after the data.】

item.title: 金价在5000美元附近企稳，伊朗风险与美联储前景成焦点
item.description: 金价在连续两日上涨后，于每盎司5000美元附近企稳，交易员正权衡中东地区不断升高的地缘政治风险。【原文：Gold steadied near $5,000 an ounce, after two days of gains, as traders weighed rising geopolitical risks in the Middle East.】

item.title: 油价在特朗普设定伊朗最后期限之际维持在近六个月高位
item.description: 油价在近六个月高位附近企稳，因美国总统特朗普表示伊朗最多有15天时间就其核计划达成协议，而美国正在中东集结大量军事力量。【原文：Oil steadied near a six-month high with President Donald Trump saying Iran had 15 days at most to strike a deal over its nuclear program, as the US assembled a vast array of forces in the Middle East.】

item.title: 私募股权债务如何使领先VPN暴露于中国黑客攻击之下
item.description:
随着财务压力不断加剧，Pulse Secure的裁员步伐加快。【原文：

Layoffs at Pulse Secure accelerated as financial pressure mounted

】

item.title: 澳大利亚银行股创纪录飙升为全球投资者提供避风港，抵御人工智能波动
item.description: 今年，利润激增推动澳大利亚银行股表现超越全球同行，为在人工智能驱动的市场波动中挣扎的投资者提供了难得的超额收益机会。【原文：A surge in profits is propelling Australian bank shares above their global peers this year, offering a rare pocket of outperformance for investors grappling with artificial intelligence-driven market swings.】

item.title: OpenAI在芯片行业短缺中仍能预见芯片供应前景
item.description: OpenAI表示，在芯片供应方面，该公司已"明确了解未来需求"，同时强调民主国家有必要为人工智能制定共同的安全标准。【原文：OpenAI said it has “visibility into what we are going to need” regarding chip supply, while emphasizing the need for democratic nations to develop shared safety standards for artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 汇丰银行重组期间裁减美国债务资本市场团队10%
item.description: 据知情人士透露，汇丰银行已裁撤其美国债务资本市场团队10%的员工，这是该行去年十月宣布业务重组后持续削减成本的举措。【原文：HSBC cut 10% of its US-based debt capital markets team, continuing to cull costs after announcing a revamp of the business last October, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 股市下跌，油价攀升，地缘政治成焦点：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市周五开盘走低，此前美国股市回落，因市场对伊朗局势的担忧加剧，令市场情绪承压。油价触及8月以来最高水平。【原文：Asian equities were set to open lower Friday after a pullback in US stocks, as heightened concerns about the situation in Iran weighed on sentiment. Oil hit the highest since August.】

item.title: 蓝猫头鹰的困境揭示了零售投资者面临的私人信贷风险
item.description: 多年来，私募信贷基金一直宣称其与金融领域其他板块存在一个关键区别：能够隔绝流动性错配风险。【原文：For years, private credit funds trumpeted a key distinction from other corners of finance: insulation from liquidity mismatches.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉试行更高油价，石油行业重启运营
item.description: 委内瑞拉已开始提高加拉加斯加油站的燃油价格，以寻求新的收入来源，同时重新向外国投资开放其石油产业并提高产量。【原文：Venezuela has started to increase fuel prices at gasoline stations in Caracas as it seeks fresh revenue while reopening its oil industry to foreign investment and boosting output.】

item.title: 得州路屋季度开局向好，股价上涨
item.description: 得州路屋公司股价上涨，此前该公司报告称第一季度开局销售强劲增长，尽管第四季度同店销售额未达华尔街预期。【原文：Texas Roadhouse Inc. shares climbed after the company reported robust sales growth for the start of the first quarter, even as fourth-quarter same-store sales fell short of Wall Street forecasts.】

item.title: 德国寻求缓解议员对蒂尔无人机公司持股的担忧
item.description: 德国正试图消除外界担忧，即该国计划向彼得·蒂尔支持的国防初创企业订购价值30亿欧元（约合35亿美元）的攻击无人机可能构成安全威胁，原因在于这位备受争议的美国投资者的背景。【原文：Germany is looking to dispel concerns that its planned €3 billion ($3.5 billion) order for attack drones from a Peter Thiel-backed defense start-up could pose a security threat due to the role of the controversial US investor.】

item.title: 白宫顾问亚雷德为哈塞特批评美联储研究报告辩护
item.description: 美国总统特朗普的一位高级经济顾问为白宫批评美联储关于关税的新研究进行了辩护，驳斥了该批评构成对央行独立性攻击的说法。【原文：A senior economic adviser to President Donald Trump defended White House criticism of new research from the Federal Reserve on tariffs, rejecting the notion it represented an attack on the central bank’s independence.】

item.title: 前高盛策略师预见美元与就业数据关联性将发生"根本性转变"
item.description: 高盛集团前策略师罗宾·布鲁克斯表示，美元因美国月度就业数据好于预期而持续十年的上涨趋势即将终结，这标志着"市场格局转变"——未来交易员将在强劲的美国就业数据公布后抛售美元。【原文：A decade-long trend of the dollar rising on better-than-expected US monthly payrolls is coming to an end, marking a “regime change” that will see traders sell the greenback on strong US job market data, former Goldman Sachs Group Inc. strategist Robin Brooks said.】

item.title: 经纪商Clear Street在推迟交易后撤回IPO申请
item.description: 基于云计算技术建立的华尔街经纪公司Clear Street Group Inc.在推迟上市计划后，撤回了首次公开募股申请。【原文：Clear Street Group Inc., a Wall Street broker built on cloud computing technology, withdrew its IPO filing after postponing plans to go public.】
